instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00840: What is 820-00840? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-00875: What is 820-00875? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
threads.message: hey guys, i have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> which im using <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> as schematics and board view, Customer opened the laptop for some reason and shorted F4800 , replaced it and it worked fine, battery was showing X, so i thought maybe he just killed his battery, placed a Known working battery and still X, do you guys think it might just be a bad ISL? Computer seems to still run from battery when unplugged, just shows X , just asking before i try to order.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
threads.message:
F4800 shouldn't affect battery.
Did you test the two batteries in other machine?

Post exact voltage for <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> power rail (F7000).
Check diode mode to ground and voltage for SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
threads.message: Inspect the battery cable that plugs in over the battery screw for any damage first and foremost.
